text: Margherita Pizza: Handcrafted tomato sauce, fresh buffalo mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.
Classic Burger: 100% beef patty, cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a sesame seed bun.
Assorted Sushi: An 8-piece selection featuring fresh salmon, tuna, white fish, and shrimp, served with soy sauce.
Caesar Salad: Romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, grated Parmesan cheese, and our signature Caesar dressing.
Funghi Risotto: Arborio rice with porcini, champignon, shiitake mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and a splash of white wine.
Spicy Pad Thai: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, egg, bean sprouts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
Vegan Quinoa Bowl: Fluffy quinoa, avocado, black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, and a zesty lime dressing.
Beef Stroganoff: Tender strips of beef, mushrooms, onions in a creamy sauce, served over egg noodles.
Chicken Tikka Masala: Grilled chicken chunks in a creamy tomato curry sauce, served with basmati rice.
Fish and Chips: Beer-battered cod served with crispy fries and tartar sauce.
Lamb Gyro: Sliced lamb, tzatziki sauce, tomatoes, onions, wrapped in a soft pita bread.
Pulled Pork Sandwich: Slow-cooked pork shoulder with BBQ sauce on a brioche bun, served with coleslaw.
Butternut Squash Soup: Creamy roasted butternut squash soup with a hint of nutmeg and cinnamon.
Lobster Roll: Chunks of lobster meat dressed in mayo and served on a toasted roll with lettuce.
Chicken Alfredo Pasta: Fettuccine pasta in a rich Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken and Parmesan.
Miso Ramen: Ramen noodles in a miso-based broth with pork slices, nori, and scallions.
Falafel Wrap: Crispy falafel balls, hummus, tahini sauce, lettuce, and tomato in a flour tortilla.
Cobb Salad: Chopped greens, chicken breast, bacon, avocado, egg, blue cheese, and vinaigrette.
Shrimp Scampi: Sautéed shrimp in garlic butter sauce, served over linguine pasta.
BBQ Ribs: Slow-cooked pork ribs glazed with BBQ sauce, served with baked beans and cornbread.
Tofu Stir-Fry: Crispy tofu and mixed vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served with rice.
Eggplant Parmesan: Breaded eggplant slices layered with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.
Pho: Vietnamese noodle soup with beef slices, rice noodles, herbs, and a flavorful beef broth.
Moussaka: Layered eggplant, minced lamb, béchamel sauce, and cheese, baked to perfection.
Paella: Traditional Spanish rice dish with chicken, rabbit, green beans, and saffron.
Banh Mi: Vietnamese sandwich with pork, pickled vegetables, cilantro, and spicy mayo on a baguette.
Ratatouille: French stewed vegetable dish with zucchini, eggplant, bell peppers, and tomatoes.
Peking Duck: Roasted duck with crispy skin, served with pancakes, scallions, and hoisin sauce.
Chili Con Carne: Spicy stew with ground beef, kidney beans, tomatoes, and chili peppers.
Beef Wellington: Tender beef fillet wrapped in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles.
Tom Yum Soup: Hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and kaffir lime leaves.
Chicken Biryani: Fragrant rice dish with spiced chicken, saffron, nuts, and raisins.
Korean BBQ: Grilled marinated beef, served with lettuce wraps and spicy Korean sauce.
Carbonara Pasta: Spaghetti with pancetta, egg, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
French Onion Soup: Caramelized onion soup topped with a toasted baguette and melted Gruyère cheese.
Tandoori Chicken: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled in a tandoor oven.
Greek Salad: Tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil dressing.
Jambalaya: Creole rice dish with shrimp, chicken, sausage, and a blend of spices.
Quiche Lorraine: Savory pie with bacon, onions, and cheese in a flaky crust.
Teriyaki Salmon: Grilled salmon fillet glazed with teriyaki sauce, served with steamed vegetables.
Chicken Enchiladas: Corn tortillas filled with chicken, topped with red sauce and melted cheese.
Clam Chowder: Creamy soup with clams, potatoes, bacon, and onions.
Vegetable Lasagna: Layers of pasta, ricotta cheese, spinach, zucchini, and marinara sauce.
Duck Confit: Slow-cooked duck leg with crispy skin, served with lentils and orange glaze.
Shepherd's Pie: Ground lamb with vegetables, topped with mashed potatoes and baked.
Szechuan Beef: Spicy stir-fried beef with chili peppers, Szechuan peppercorns, and peanuts.
Caprese Salad: Sliced tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze.
Goulash: Hungarian beef stew with paprika, onions, and bell peppers.
Chicken Parmesan: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
Tacos al Pastor: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, onions, cilantro, and salsa.
